name: Bradshaw & Sons Heartsease Seeds
description:
A packet of heritage Heartsease seeds.

These beautiful heartsease (Viola tricolour) flowers are edible and add colour to summer salads or frozen in ice cubes. Sow in Spring. 

Handpacked by Thomas Etty Esq for year ending 2014. Registered seed packer - FERA Ref No 2807.

name: Bradshaw & Sons Bluebell Seeds
description:
A packet of native British bluebell seeds.

The British bluebell (Hyacintoides non-scripta) is a smaller more delicate plant than its Spanish relative, more frequently available in garden centres. The British bluebell is under threat from hybridisation with the larger varities. We associate them with woodlands but along the coastal paths of Pembrokeshire and island of Skomer they grow in the open. Sow under glass and protect from extremes of weather for 15 months before planting out. 

Handpacked by Thomas Etty Esq for year ending 2014. Registered seed packer - FERA Ref No 2807.

name: Bradshaw & Sons Foxglove Seeds
description:
A packet of heritage foxglove (Digitalis purpurea) seeds

Sow in open ground between April and August and enjoy the blooms of this cottage garden favourite. Attract bees and butterflies with this tall and beautiful flower. 

Handpacked by Thomas Etty Esq for year ending 2014. Registered seed packer - FERA Ref No 2807.

name: Bradshaw & Sons Mammoth Pumpkin Seeds
description:
A packet of heritage Mammoth pumpkin seeds. 

Grow your own HUGE pumpkin ready for carving at Halloween! These seeds are a heritage variety dating back to 1834. Sow in Spring ready for harvesting in Autumn. Join Bradshaw & Sons race to grow the biggest pumpkin! 

Handpacked by Thomas Etty Esq for year ending 2014. Registered seed packer - FERA Ref No 2807.

name: Bradshaw & Sons Gingerbread Recipe & Template
description:
We love making gingerbread houses every Christmas and this is our delicious gingerbread recipe and template to make your very own house at home. It also comes with a royal icing recipe to help you decorate your creation. 

You are buying a PDF that will be emailed to you upon purchase.
